GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.18.13
GSD.description:
net: stmmac: dwc-qos: Disable split header for Tegra194

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.13 by commit cfa4caf3e881ad6dd366c903c34f1c7f21b857ab, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 67afd6d1cfdf0d0461fe3c4c922447f3e9b1c6ee. For more details please see the references link.
